s0101.chinese: 孝景中六年，他廣奪侯為庶人，國除。
s0101.idiomatic: When Heng died, his son Han Yu succeeded him.

s0102.idiomatic: When Yu died, his son Han Xian succeeded him.

s0103.chinese: 陳勝起時，商聚少年東西略人，得數千。
s0103.idiomatic: When Xian died, his son Han Jia succeeded him.

s0104.chinese: 沛公略地至陳留，六月餘，商以將卒四千人屬沛公於岐。
s0104.idiomatic: When Jia died, his son Han Hong succeeded him.

s0105.chinese: 從攻長社，先登，賜爵封信成君。
s0105.idiomatic: When Hong died, his son Han Yi succeeded him.

s0106.chinese: 從沛公攻緱氏，絕河津，破秦軍洛陽東。
s0106.idiomatic: When Yi died, his son Han An succeeded him.

s0107.idiomatic: When An died, his son Han Rong succeeded him.

s0108.idiomatic: When Rong died, his son Han Xu succeeded him.

s0109.chinese: 項羽滅秦，立沛公為漢王。
s0109.idiomatic: When Xu died, his son Han Sui succeeded him.

s0110.chinese: 漢王賜商爵信成君，以將軍為隴西都尉。
s0110.idiomatic: When Sui died, his son Han Duan succeeded him.

s0111.idiomatic: When Duan died, his son Han Chen succeeded him.

s0112.chinese: 破雍將軍焉氏，周類軍栒邑，蘇駔軍於泥陽。
s0112.idiomatic: When Chen died, his son Han Yi succeeded him.

s0113.idiomatic: When Yi died, his son Han Zhao succeeded him.

s0114.chinese: 以隴西都尉從擊項籍軍五月，出鉅野，與鐘離眛戰，疾鬬，受梁相國印，益食邑四千戶。
s0114.idiomatic: When Zhao died, his son Han Yan succeeded him.

s0115.chinese: 以梁相國將從擊項羽二歲三月，攻胡陵。
s0115.idiomatic: When Yan died, his son Han Qiang succeeded him.

s0116.idiomatic: When Qiang died, his son Han Yan succeeded him.

s0117.chinese: 其秋，燕王臧荼反，商以將軍從擊荼，戰龍脫，先登陷陣，破荼軍易下，卻敵，遷為右丞相，賜爵列侯，與諸侯剖符，世世勿絕，食邑涿五千戶，號曰涿侯。
s0117.idiomatic: When Yan died, his son Han Wu succeeded him.

s0118.chinese: 以右丞相別定上谷，因攻代，受趙相國印。
s0118.idiomatic: When Wu died, his son Han Zhuang succeeded him.

s0119.chinese: 以右丞相趙相國別與絳侯等定代、鴈門，得代丞相程縱、守相郭同、將軍已下至六百石十九人。
s0119.idiomatic: When Zhuang died, his son Han Jie succeeded him.

s0120.chinese: 還，以將軍為太上皇衛一歲七月。
s0120.idiomatic: When Jie died, his son Han Min succeeded him.

s0121.chinese: 以右丞相擊陳豨，殘東垣。
s0121.idiomatic: When Min died, his son Han Zhi succeeded him.

s0122.chinese: 又以右丞相從高帝擊黥布，攻其前拒，陷兩陳，得以破布軍，更食曲周五千一百戶，除前所食，凡別破軍三，降定郡六，縣七十三，得丞相、守相、大將各一人，小將二人，二千石已下至六百石十九人。
s0122.idiomatic: When Zhi died, his son Han Fu succeeded him.

s0123.chinese: 商事孝惠、高后時，商病，不治。
s0123.idiomatic: When Fu died, his son Han Xian succeeded him.

s0124.idiomatic: When Xian died, his son Han Yu succeeded him.

s0125.chinese: 及高后崩，大臣欲誅諸呂，呂祿為將軍，軍於北軍，太尉勃不得入北軍，於是乃使人劫酈商，令其子況紿呂祿，呂祿信之，故與出游，而太尉勃乃得入據北軍，遂誅諸呂。
s0125.idiomatic: When Yu died, his son Han Kang succeeded him.

s0126.idiomatic: When Kang died, his son Han He succeeded him.

s0127.idiomatic: When He died, his son Han Qi succeeded him.

s0128.idiomatic: When Qi died, his son Han Yuan succeeded him.

s0129.chinese: 孝景前三年，吳、楚、齊、趙反，上以寄為將軍，圍趙城，十月不能下。
s0129.idiomatic: When Yuan died, his son Han Mao succeeded him.

s0130.chinese: 得俞侯欒布自平齊來，乃下趙城，滅趙，王自殺，除國。
s0130.idiomatic: When Mao died, his son Han Bao succeeded him.

s0131.chinese: 孝景中二年，寄欲取平原君為夫人，景帝怒，下寄吏，有罪，奪侯。
s0131.idiomatic: When Bao died, his son Han Xun succeeded him.

s0132.chinese: 景帝乃以商他子堅封為繆侯，續酈氏後。
s0132.idiomatic: When Xun died, his son Han Ji succeeded him.

s0133.chinese: 繆靖侯卒，子康侯遂成立。
s0133.idiomatic: When Ji died, his son Han Ying succeeded him.

s0134.idiomatic: When Ying died, his son Han Huang succeeded him.

s0135.chinese: 世宗卒，子侯終根立，為太常，坐法，國除。
s0135.idiomatic: When Huang died, his son Han Kui succeeded him.

s0136.idiomatic: When Kui died, his son Han Yong succeeded him.

s0137.idiomatic: When Yong died, his son Han Xi succeeded him.

s0138.chinese: 每送使客還，過沛泗上亭，與高祖語，未嘗不移日也。
s0138.idiomatic: When Xi died, his son Han Yan succeeded him.

s0139.chinese: 嬰已而試補縣吏，與高祖相愛。
s0139.idiomatic: When Yan died, his son Han Jing succeeded him.

s0140.chinese: 高祖戲而傷嬰，人有告高祖。
s0140.idiomatic: When Jing died, his son Han Fang succeeded him.

s0141.chinese: 高祖時為亭長，重坐傷人，告故不傷嬰，嬰證之。
s0141.idiomatic: When Fang died, his son Han Xun succeeded him.

s0142.chinese: 後獄覆，嬰坐高祖系歲餘，掠笞數百，終以是脫高祖。
s0142.idiomatic: When Xun died, his son Han Zhu succeeded him.

s0143.chinese: 高祖之初與徒屬欲攻沛也，嬰時以縣令史為高祖使。
s0143.idiomatic: When Zhu died, his son Han Wei succeeded him.

s0144.chinese: 上降沛一日，高祖為沛公，賜嬰爵七大夫，以為太仆。
s0144.idiomatic: When Wei died, his son Han Liang succeeded him.

s0145.chinese: 從攻胡陵，嬰與蕭何降泗水監平，平以胡陵降，賜嬰爵五大夫。
s0145.idiomatic: When Liang died, his son Han Kang succeeded him.

s0146.chinese: 從擊秦軍碭東，攻濟陽，下戶牖，破李由軍雍丘下，以兵車趣攻戰疾，賜爵執帛。
s0146.idiomatic: When Kang died, his son Han Sheng succeeded him.

s0147.chinese: 常以太仆奉車從擊章邯軍東阿、濮陽下，以兵車趣攻戰疾，破之，賜爵執珪。
s0147.idiomatic: When Sheng died, his son Han Xiang succeeded him.

s0148.chinese: 復常奉車從擊趙賁軍開封，楊熊軍曲遇。
s0148.idiomatic: When Xiang died, his son Han Peng succeeded him.

s0149.chinese: 嬰從捕虜六十八人，降卒八百五十人，得印一匱。
s0149.idiomatic: When Peng died, his son Han Qu succeeded him.

s0150.chinese: 因復常奉車從擊秦軍雒陽東，以兵車趣攻戰疾，賜爵封轉為滕公。
s0150.idiomatic: When Qu died, his son Han Quan succeeded him.
